skins.shipDescription: Cleveland-class light cruiser C Columbia, hull number CL-56.
skins.selfIntroduction: Hiii! It's me, the girl who scooted through the Pacific and earned 10 battle stars: Columbia! Hey, now, no need to sing my praises, go see Cleveland and sing hers instead! Need anything else? Alright, then I'll get back to patrolling.
skins.acquisition: Cleveland-class light cruiser number 2, Columbia! That's me~! Not the Columbia in D.C., the one in South Carolina! Geez, listen to me! Not the Columbia with Bogotá as its capital!
skins.login: Another day of calm weather! Nice!
skins.details: You wanna get to know me? Sure thing. Inspect me to your heart's content.
skins.secretaryIdle1: What tunes do I listen to? Good question. See if you can guess! ... Rock 'n' roll? Bzzzt, wrong!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Bleh, my sis snatched my sunglasses again...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Once this war is over, maybe I should give Eagle Union football a try...
skins.secretaryTouch: Gee, thanks! You made my bubble pop!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, is it this star on my shirt you like? Or is it... what's underneath it~?

skins.shipDescription: Commander, here, I made some chocolate for you~ Come on, hurry up and take it already! Holding this pose makes me look like I'm waiting for some Prince Charming, and it's super embarrassing.
